attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support our wonderful and kind president. I was doing the usual stuff you know opening the app and about to sign in. Then all of the sudden out of freaking nowhere this image of a giant, grotesque, wrinkly, orange alien wearing a toupee and a suit popped up. Well I was in such a state of shock that I completely blacked out and when I woke up the app mysteriously disappeared but no matter what that image will still be forever ingrained in my mind till the end of time.

This is completely unacceptable and I am outraged. This occurrence made me completely hate trump and now I will  #settleforbiden .
